FuncDef:
The neighbor-check receive command enables a device to check whether Join/Prune and Assert messages are received from a PIM neighbor.
The undo neighbor-check receive command restores the default configuration. The neighbor-check receive command enables a device to check whether Join/Prune and Assert messages are received from a PIM neighbor. The undo neighbor-check receive command restores the default configuration. By default, the PIM neighbor check function is not enabled.
ParentView: VPN instance PIM view,PIM view of a public network instance
